title: Chupa Chup Typeface
content:
Hey. I'm trying to figure out the typeface that Chupa Chups uses on their website/ads.  
I know the logo itself was custom made by Salvador Dali, but does anyone know the typefaces used here?  
 [http://www.chupachups.com/homepage.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014055847/http:/www.chupachups.com/homepage.html "http://www.chupachups.com/homepage.html")

I would like to know both the body type and the type on the bottom of the page used for contact info.
author: arwirrenga

comments.content:
Hi,  
It's a Google webfont called Nunito; designed by Vernon Adams.  
 [http://goo.gl/STVJl](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014055847/http:/goo.gl/STVJl "http://goo.gl/STVJl")
